downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 Support for IFRS
downloadDescription: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 support for IFRS White Paper

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 Support for IFRS.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/c/f/8cf7ea81-bdfe-455b-864d-ecd0a13fadce/Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 Support for IFRS.pdf

detailsSection: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP and Microsoft developed this paper together to explain how Microsoft Dynamics AX can help organizations appropriately use and apply the International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 Support for IFRS.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
